SQL.LOAD: SELECT RAWTOHEX(dealer_recon_wrk_id) AS dealer_recon_wrk_id, 2 AS ITEM_NUMBER, ITEM2_MANUFACTURER AS ITEM_MANUFACTURER, ITEM2_MODEL AS ITEM_MODEL, ITEM2_SERIAL_NUMBER AS ITEM_SERIAL_NUMBER, ITEM2_DESCRIPTION AS ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM2_PRICE AS ITEM_PRICE, ITEM2_BUNDLE_VAL AS ITEM_BUNDLE_VAL, ITEM2_MAN_WARRANTY AS ITEM_MAN_WARRANTY FROM elp_dealer_recon_wrk WHERE dealer_recon_wrk_id = :dealer_recon_wrk_id --AND reject_reason IS NOT NULL
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT RAWTOHEX(CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID) AS CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID, 1 AS PART_NUMBER, PART_1_SKU AS PART_SKU, PART_1_DESCRIPTION AS PART_DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK WHERE CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID = :CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID UNION SELECT RAWTOHEX(CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID) AS CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID, 2 AS PART_NUMBER, PART_2_SKU AS PART_SKU, PART_2_DESCRIPTION AS PART_DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK WHERE CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID = :CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID UNION SELECT RAWTOHEX(CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID) AS CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID, 3 AS PART_NUMBER, PART_3_SKU AS PART_SKU, PART_3_DESCRIPTION AS PART_DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK WHERE CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID = :CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID UNION SELECT RAWTOHEX(CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID) AS CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID, 4 AS PART_NUMBER, PART_4_SKU AS PART_SKU, PART_4_DESCRIPTION AS PART_DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK WHERE CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID = :CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID UNION SELECT RAWTOHEX(CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID) AS CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID, 5 AS PART_NUMBER, PART_5_SKU AS PART_SKU, PART_5_DESCRIPTION AS PART_DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK WHERE CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID = :CLAIMLOAD_RECON_WRK_ID
